content: We want to create a list, lets say 1,2,3,3,4 for FHIRPath evaluation. However, the spec isn't really clear on how to do that. We could use a union operator, however, that removes duplicates. (1|2|3|3|4) results in a list of 1,2,3,4. What can we use to keep duplicates?
combine() - but there is no syntactic short cut for that
